pages.text: Title .color-block{ height: 10px; width: 10px; } span{ line-height: 2; } $(function(){ let htmlobj=$.ajax({url:"index.json",async:false}); const info = htmlobj.responseJSON; $("#name").text($("#name").text()+info.name); $("#phone").text($("#phone").text()+info.phone); $("#birth").text($("#birth").text()+info.birth); $("#email").text($("#email").text()+info.email); $("#address").text($("#address").text()+info.address); }); ğŸ‘¦å§“åï¼š ğŸ§æ‰‹æœºï¼š ğŸ‚ç”Ÿæ—¥ï¼š ğŸ’Œé‚®ä»¶ï¼š ğŸ¡åœ°å€ï¼š

posts.text: å°è£…request è·å–openIdå’Œsession_key è·å–ç”¨æˆ·æ‰‹æœºå· è·å–access_token æ¨é€è®¢é˜…æ¶ˆæ¯ å°è£…request (api.js) 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041/* è¯·æ±‚çš„é”™è¯¯ä¸åº”è¯¥è¢«è°ƒç”¨æ–¹catch æŠŠé”™è¯¯çš„è¯·æ±‚å½“æˆè¯·æ±‚æ­£å¸¸è¿”å›çš„ç»“æœ ç”±è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ ¹æ®çŠ¶æ€ç æ¥åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ *//* æœåŠ¡ç«¯IP+ç«¯å£ */export const API_URI = 'http://192.168.0.22:8000'/* è°ƒç”¨çš„è¯·æ±‚æ–¹æ³• */function request(url,requestType,params) { return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { wxRequest(url, requestType, params).then(res=>{ console.log("reqæˆåŠŸ") resolve(res) }).catch(err => { console.log("reqå¤±è´¥") resolve({ code: -200, message: "è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥", data: err}); }) })}/* å°è£…wx.request */function wxRequest(url, requestType, params){ return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { wx.request({ url: `${API_URI}/${url}`, data: params ? params : null, method: requestType ? requestType : 'POST', success: function (res) { resolve(res); }, fail: function (err) { reject(err); } }) })}/* æš´éœ²æ–¹æ³•ç»™å¤–éƒ¨ */module.exports = { request} è·å–openIdå’Œsession_keyè·å–openId éœ€è¦å…ˆè°ƒç”¨wx.login()è·å¾—code,å†è°ƒç”¨åå°æœåŠ¡ç™»é™†æ¥å£å–å¾—openId å°ç¨‹åºç«¯123456789101112131415login(){ wx.login({ success(res) { console.log(res) if (res.code) { //å‘èµ·ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚ api.request('login/login','POST',res).then(login_res=>{ console.log('ç™»é™†æˆåŠŸ', login_res) }) } else { console.log('ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥ï¼' + login_res.errMsg) } } })} åå°æœåŠ¡ç«¯123456789101112131415161718@RestController@RequestMapping("/login")public class LoginController { @PostMapping("login") public Bo2Result login(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> param){ String apiUrl="https://api.weixin.qq.com/sns/jscode2session?" +"appid="+ Config.APP_ID +"&secret="+Config.APP_SECRET +"&js_code="+param.get("code") +"&grant_type=authorization_code"; System.out.println(apiUrl); String result = HttpHelper.doGet(apiUrl); return Bo2Result.success(result); }} è¿”å›ç»“æœ12345678{ code: 0 data: { openid: "o1YDY1TkXx8AtjOx5s**********", session_key: "IDLvXLfdOAkp**********==" } msg: "SUCCESS"} è·å–ç”¨æˆ·æ‰‹æœºå·è¿™ä¸ªå¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¼ä¸šè®¤è¯çš„å°ç¨‹åºæ‰å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨å“¦12345678910111213141516171819getPhoneNumber(e) { /* ç”¨æˆ·åŒæ„è·å–æ‰‹æœºå· */ if (e.detail.errMsg === 'getPhoneNumber:ok'){ this.wx_login().then(wx_login_res => { return wx_login_res; }).then(wx_login_res => { return this.ser_login(wx_login_res) }).then(ser_login_res => { let map = { session_key: ser_login_res.data.data.session_key, encryptedData : e.detail.encryptedData, iv : e.detail.iv } return this.decipher_phone(map); }).then(phone_res => { console.log('è·å–ç”¨æˆ·æ‰‹æœºæˆåŠŸ',phone_res) }) }} other function123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536wx_login(){ return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { wx.login({ success(res) { console.log(res) if (res.code) { resolve(res) } else { reject("err") } } }) })},ser_login(param){ return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{ api.request('login/login', 'POST', param).then(login_res => { if (login_res.data.code === 0) { resolve(login_res) } else { reject("err") } }) })},decipher_phone(param){ return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { api.request('test/get_phone', 'POST', param).then(decipher_phone_res => { if (decipher_phone_res.data.code === 0) { resolve(decipher_phone_res) } else { reject("err") } }) })} è·å–access_token12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667package com.leerau.leerauserver.service.test;import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject;import com.leerau.bo2.exception.Bo2Exception;import com.leerau.bo2.exception.ResponseCodeEnum;import com.leerau.leerauserver.conf.Config;import com.leerau.leerauserver.util.HttpHelper;import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;import org.springframework.data.redis.core.RedisTemplate;import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;import java.util.Map;import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;@Service@Slf4jpublic class TestService { private static final String GET_ACCESS_TOKEN_URL = "https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/token?grant_type=client_credential&" + "appid=" + Config.APP_ID + "&secret="+Config.APP_SECRET; @Autowired private RedisTemplate redisTemplate; public String getAccessToken(){ /*å…ˆçœ‹ä¸€ä¸‹redisé‡Œé¢è¿˜æœ‰æ²¡æœ‰,å¦‚æœæœ‰å°±ä¸ç”¨é‡æ–°è·å–äº†*/ Object object = redisTemplate.opsForValue().get(Config.ACCESS_TOKEN_NAME); String token=""; log.info("GET_ACCESS_TOKEN_URL:"+GET_ACCESS_TOKEN_URL); if(object==null){ String tokenInfo = HttpHelper.doGet(GET_ACCESS_TOKEN_URL); Map<String,Object> tokenMap = JSONObject.parseObject(tokenInfo, Map.class); if(tokenMap==null){ throw new Bo2Exception( ResponseCodeEnum.DEFEATED.getCode(), ResponseCodeEnum.DEFEATED.getMessage() ); } if(tokenMap.get("errcode")!=null){ throw new Bo2Exception( Integer.parseInt(tokenMap.get("errcode").toString()), tokenMap.get("errmsg").toString() ); } redisTemplate .opsForValue() .set( /*tokenåç§°*/ Config.ACCESS_TOKEN_NAME, /*tokenå€¼*/ tokenMap.get("access_token"), /*è®¾ç½®æœ‰æ•ˆæ—¶é—´*/ Long.parseLong(tokenMap.get("expires_in").toString())-300, /*æœ‰æ•ˆæ—¶é—´å•ä½*/ TimeUnit.SECONDS); token = tokenMap.get("access_token").toString(); }else{ token = object.toString(); } return token; };} æ¨é€è®¢é˜…æ¶ˆæ¯æ¨é€è®¢é˜…æ¶ˆæ¯éœ€è¦å…ˆ é€šè¿‡æŒ‰é’®çš„å½¢å¼è°ƒç”¨ wx.requestSubscribeMessage() å¦‚æœå¤±è´¥åˆ™è¡¨æ˜ç”¨æˆ·ä¸å…è®¸æ¨é€ æˆåŠŸåˆ™ä¸ºå…è®¸å°ç¨‹åºç«¯1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344 /*è·å–ä¸€ä¸‹æ¨é€è®¢é˜…æ¶ˆæ¯æƒé™ (app.js)*/getSendAuth() { return new Promise((resolve, reject) => { wx.requestSubscribeMessage({ /*æ¨¡æ¿id*/ tmplIds: ['J8ShRqDO1bX4JN8pLV_o12seZR62ujTmUfeW8GRxvas'], success(res) { resolve(res) }, fail(res){ resolve(res) } }) })} /* (index.js)*/deliverMessage(){ /*è·å–æƒé™*/ app.getSendAuth().then(send_auth_res=>{ return send_auth_res; }).then(send_auth_res=>{ if(send_auth_res){ /*ç™»é™†ä»¥è·å–openid (æ­£å¸¸åº”è¯¥åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶è·å–å¹¶å‚¨å­˜åœ¨å‰å°)*/ return app.wx_login() } }).then(wx_login_res => { return wx_login_res; }).then(wx_login_res => { return app.ser_login(wx_login_res) }).then(ser_login_res => { console.log("ser_login_res", ser_login_res) return ser_login_res; }).then(login_res => { /*è·å–åˆ°openid*/ console.log('login_res', login_res) if(login_res.errMsg === 'equest:ok' || login_res.data.code === 0){ let openId = {openId:login_res.data.data.openid} /*è°ƒç”¨åå°æ¨é€æ¥å£ï¼Œå¹¶ä¼ å…¥openId*/ return api.request('test/send_deliver_message','POST',openId) } }).then(send_deliver_message_res=>{ console.log('send_deliver_message_res',send_deliver_message_res); }) }, æœåŠ¡ç«¯1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435public Bo2Result sendDeliverMessage(Map<String,Object> map){ String paramString = "{" +"\"touser\":\""+map.get("openId")+"\"" +",\"template_id\":\""+Config.DELIVER_ORDER_MESSAGE_ID+"\"" +",\"page\":\"index\"" +",\"miniprogram_state\":\"developer\"" +",\"lang\":\"zh_CN\"" +",\"data\":{" + "\"character_string1\":{" + "\"value\":\"5299\"" + "}," + "\"time2\":{" + "\"value\":\"2019å¹´10æœˆ1æ—¥ 15:01\"" + "}," + "\"phone_number3\":{" + "\"value\":\"17640177992\"" + "}," + "\"character_string4\":{" + "\"value\":\"434991667\"" + "}," + "\"thing6\":{" + "\"value\":\"LEERAUç‰©æµ\"" + "}" + "}" +"}"; log.info(paramString); String subscribeUrl = Config.SUBSCRIBE_URL + getAccessToken(); String result = HttpHelper.doPostJson(subscribeUrl,paramString); return Bo2Result.success(result); }

posts.text: HTML ä»£ç 12345<div> <img src="https://avatars2.githubusercontent.com/u/67574181?s=400&u=d3a38528087e1b186a2ca6f36d5adebaa4d818d3&v=4" width = "150" height = "150" align=center /></div> JAVA ä»£ç 12345678910111213141516/** * @author John Smith <john.smith@example.com>*/package l2f.gameserver.model;public abstract strictfp class L2Char extends L2Object { public static final Short ERROR = 0x0001; public void moveTo(int x, int y, int z) { _ai = null; log("Should not be called"); if (1 > 5) { // wtf!? return; } }} XML ä»£ç 1<artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
